mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: QRent is dedicated to simplifying the rental property search experience for students and young professionals. We understand that finding the perfect place to live can be overwhelming, time-consuming, and stressful. That's why we've built a platform that aggregates rental listings, analyzes them with intelligent scoring, and helps you make informed decisions quickly.
mission.description2: Our smart scoring system evaluates properties based on multiple factors including location, price, amenities, and proximity to universities, giving you a comprehensive view at a glance.

smartAggregation.title: Smart Aggregation
smartAggregation.description: We collect and organize rental listings from multiple sources, saving you hours of searching across different platforms.

intelligentScoring.title: Intelligent Scoring
intelligentScoring.description: Our proprietary algorithm scores each property based on value, location, amenities, and other key factors.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-Time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Stay informed with up-to-date listings and availability information, so you never miss out on great opportunities.

personalizedExperience.title: Personalized Experience
personalizedExperience.description: Save your preferences, track favorite properties, and receive notifications about new listings that match your criteria.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description1: QRent was born from personal experience. As students ourselves, we faced the challenges of finding quality, affordable housing while balancing studies and limited budgets. We realized that the rental market needed a better solution—one that combines technology with genuine understanding of renters' needs.
ourStory.description2: Today, we're proud to help thousands of renters find their ideal homes, making the process easier, faster, and more transparent. We're constantly evolving our platform based on user feedback and market trends to serve you better.

Team.title: Meet Our Team
Team.subtitle: We're a diverse group of developers, designers, and rental market enthusiasts working together to revolutionize the way people find their homes.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who want to make a difference in the rental market. If you're interested in joining QRent, we'd love to hear from you!

zhiyang.bio: Product visionary with a strong business background. Zhiyang drives QRent's strategic direction, ensuring the platform meets real market needs while building sustainable growth for the company.

cliff.bio: System architect and DevOps expert who designed QRent's scalable infrastructure. Cliff ensures seamless deployment pipelines and robust full-stack solutions that power our platform.

zack.bio: Data specialist who transforms raw property information into actionable insights. Yibin builds the data pipelines and analytics that help users make informed rental decisions.

yuting.bio: Frontend developer focused on creating intuitive and responsive user experiences. Yuting crafts the interfaces that make property searching effortless and enjoyable.

qixin.bio: Frontend engineer passionate about performance and accessibility. Qixin ensures QRent delivers a fast, polished experience across all devices and browsers.

zhongtao.bio: AI specialist building intelligent chatbot solutions. Zhongtao develops conversational interfaces that help users find their perfect rental through natural language interactions.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: Have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below or reach out through any of our channels.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Blog.title: Learn how to boost your rental search
Blog.subtitle: Discover strategies to get your ideal rental properties with QRent. From search optimization and property evaluation to lease negotiation and move-in preparation, explore our resources and take control of your rental journey.
Blog.author: QRent Team
